DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether injection needle pen point type 'PP Gauge 25' should be recommended as a primary choice of needle (in stead of 'PP Gauge 27') for healthy pregnant women who at delivery (vaginal or cesarean section) get spinal anesthesia.
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of Needle Diameter on Post Dural Puncture Headache
DOC.criteria: healthy pregnant spinal anesthesia at delivery (vaginal delivery or cesarean section emergency grade 24) informed consent chronic headache (attempt to) epidural anesthesia
